#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

# ██████╗ ██╗██╗   ██╗███████╗██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔══██╗██║██║   ██║██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║  ██║██║██║   ██║█████╗  ██████╔╝███████╗
# ██║  ██║██║╚██╗ ██╔╝██╔══╝  ██╔══██╗╚════██║
# ██████╔╝██║ ╚████╔╝ ███████╗██║  ██║███████║
# ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝  ╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

infamy_international_trade_pariah = {
	is_shown = {
		infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
	}
}

infamy_international_trade = {
	is_shown = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
	}
}

has_national_stockpile = {
	is_shown = {
		has_building = building_national_stockpile
	}
}

is_national_stockpile = {
	is_shown = {
		is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
	}
}

not_is_national_stockpile = {
	is_shown = {
		not = {
			is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

# ███████╗███████╗██╗     ███████╗ ██████╗████████╗██╗ ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗     ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██║     ██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝██║██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║    ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
# ███████╗█████╗  ██║     █████╗  ██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║    ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║            ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║  ██║
# ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══╝  ██║        ██║   ██║██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║    ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║            ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║  ██║
# ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗╚██████╗   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║    ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗       ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██████╔╝
# ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝     ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝       ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗    ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║       ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║       ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║       ██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#grain
trade_grain_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_grain_budget_panel
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_wood_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_coal_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_iron_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_sulfur_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_lead_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_oil_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_dye_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_silk_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_rubber_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

trade_grain_budget_panel_show = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_grain_budget_panel = 1
	}
}
#wood
trade_wood_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_grain_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_wood_budget_panel
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_coal_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_iron_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_sulfur_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_lead_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_oil_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_dye_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_silk_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_rubber_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

	is_shown = {
		var:trade_wood_budget_panel = 1
	}
}

#ammunition
trade_ammunition_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ammunition_budget_panel
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_small_arms_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_artillery_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_tanks_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_aeroplanes_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_manowars_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ironclads_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

trade_ammunition_budget_panel_show = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_ammunition_budget_panel = 1
	}
}

#manowars
trade_manowars_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ammunition_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_small_arms_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_artillery_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_tanks_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_aeroplanes_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_manowars_budget_panel
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ironclads_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

trade_manowars_budget_panel_show = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_manowars_budget_panel = 1
	}
}

#ironclads
trade_ironclads_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ammunition_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_small_arms_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_artillery_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_tanks_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_aeroplanes_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_manowars_budget_panel
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_ironclads_budget_panel
			value = 1
		}
	}
}

trade_ironclads_budget_panel_show = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_ironclads_budget_panel = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#  ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗     ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██║   ██║█████╗  █████╗      ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║            ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║  ██║█████╗
# ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██║   ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══╝      ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║            ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║  ██║██╔══╝
# ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ╚██████╔╝██║     ██║         ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗       ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██████╔╝███████╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═╝     ╚═╝          ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝       ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗    ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║       ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║       ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║       ██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#grain

grain_buy_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_grain_var
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
grain_sell_off = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_grain_var
			value = 0
		}

	}
}
grain_buy_on_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_grain_var = 1
	}
}
grain_sell_off_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_grain_var = 0
	}
}

#  ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗ █████╗ ███╗   ██╗████████╗██╗████████╗██╗   ██╗     ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗
# ██╔═══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗████╗  ██║╚══██╔══╝██║╚══██╔══╝╚██╗ ██╔╝    ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║   ██║██║   ██║███████║██╔██╗ ██║   ██║   ██║   ██║    ╚████╔╝     ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║            ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║  ██║█████╗
# ██║▄▄ ██║██║   ██║██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║   ██║   ██║   ██║     ╚██╔╝      ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║            ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║  ██║██╔══╝
# ╚██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║ ╚████║   ██║   ██║   ██║      ██║       ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗       ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██████╔╝███████╗
#  ╚══▀▀═╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝      ╚═╝        ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝       ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗    ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║       ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║       ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║       ██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#grain
increase_grain_quantity = {
	is_shown = {
		grain_market_panel_quantity <= 1000000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_market_panel_quantity
				var:grain_market_panel_quantity < 1000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_market_panel_quantity
				add = 50000
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_grain_quantity = {
	is_shown = {
		grain_market_panel_quantity > 50000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_market_panel_quantity
				var:grain_market_panel_quantity > 50000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_market_panel_quantity
				subtract = 50000
			}
		}
	}
}

#wood
increase_wood_quantity = {
	is_shown = {
		wood_market_panel_quantity <= 1000000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_market_panel_quantity
				var:wood_market_panel_quantity < 1000000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_market_panel_quantity
				add = 50000
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_wood_quantity = {
	is_shown = {
		wood_market_panel_quantity > 50000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_market_panel_quantity
				var:wood_market_panel_quantity > 50000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_market_panel_quantity
				subtract = 50000
			}
		}
	}
}

}
reduce_lead_quantity = {
	is_shown = {
		lead_market_panel_quantity > 50000
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_market_panel_quantity
				var:lead_market_panel_quantity > 50000
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_market_panel_quantity
				subtract = 50000
			}
		}
	}
}

# ██╗   ██╗██╗███████╗██╗██████╗ ██╗     ███████╗     ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗
# ██║   ██║██║██╔════╝██║██╔══██╗██║     ██╔════╝    ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝
# ██║   ██║██║███████╗██║██████╔╝██║     █████╗      ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║            ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║  ██║█████╗
# ╚██╗ ██╔╝██║╚════██║██║██╔══██╗██║     ██╔══╝      ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║            ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║  ██║██╔══╝
#  ╚████╔╝ ██║███████║██║██████╔╝███████╗███████╗    ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗       ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██████╔╝███████╗
#   ╚═══╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝╚══════╝     ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝       ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝ ╚══════╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗    ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║       ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║       ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║       ██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#grain
buy_grain_budget_panel_visible = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		gold_reserves > international_buy_grain_budget_panel
		stockpiling_grain_var_state < 9000000
		has_technology_researched = international_trade
	}
}

# ███████╗███████╗███████╗███████╗ ██████╗████████╗     ██████╗ ██╗      ██████╗ ██████╗  █████╗ ██╗         ████████╗██████╗  █████╗ ██████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔════╝ ██║     ██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██║         ╚══██╔══╝██╔══██╗██╔══██╗██╔══██╗
# █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██║        ██║       ██║  ███╗██║     ██║   ██║██████╔╝███████║██║            ██║   ██████╔╝███████║██║  ██║
# ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██║        ██║       ██║   ██║██║     ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║            ██║   ██╔══██╗██╔══██║██║  ██║
# ███████╗██║     ██║     ███████╗╚██████╗   ██║       ╚██████╔╝███████╗╚██████╔╝██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗       ██║   ██║  ██║██║  ██║██████╔╝
# ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝        ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝       ╚═╝   ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═════╝
#
# ██████╗ ██╗   ██╗██████╗  ██████╗ ███████╗████████╗    ██████╗  █████╗ ███╗   ██╗███████╗██╗
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔════╝ ██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔══██╗██╔══██╗████╗  ██║██╔════╝██║
# ██████╔╝██║   ██║██║  ██║██║  ███╗█████╗     ██║       ██████╔╝███████║██╔██╗ ██║█████╗  ██║
# ██╔══██╗██║   ██║██║  ██║██║   ██║██╔══╝     ██║       ██╔═══╝ ██╔══██║██║╚██╗██║██╔══╝  ██║
# ██████╔╝╚██████╔╝██████╔╝╚██████╔╝███████╗   ██║       ██║     ██║  ██║██║ ╚████║███████╗███████╗
# ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝ ╚══════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚══════╝╚══════╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#grain
buy_grain_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = international_buy_grain_budget_panel
			#add = international_buy_grain_budget_panel
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
					add = owner.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#wood
buy_wood_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = international_buy_wood_budget_panel
			#add = international_buy_wood_budget_panel
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
					add = owner.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

buy_oil_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = international_buy_oil_budget_panel
			#add = international_buy_oil_budget_panel
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
					add = owner.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#dye
buy_dye_budget_panel = {
	effect = {
		add_treasury = {
			value = 0
			subtract = international_buy_dye_budget_panel
			#add = international_buy_dye_budget_panel
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
					add = owner.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# ╚════██║██╔══╝  ██║     ██║         ██║     ██║██║╚██╔╝██║██║   ██║
# ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗    ███████╗██║██║ ╚═╝ ██║██║   ██║
# ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝    ╚══════╝╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚═╝   ╚═╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

sell_limit_var_show = {
	is_shown = {
		var:sell_limit_var_1 > 0
	}
}

sell_limit_var_show_0 = {
	is_shown = {
		var:sell_limit_var_1 = 0
	}
}

# ╚██████╗╚██████╔╝██║  ██║██║  ██║███████╗██║ ╚████║╚██████╗   ██║       ███████║███████╗███████╗███████╗╚██████╗   ██║   ██║╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║    ██║     ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝       ╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝   ╚═╝ ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝    ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝

#grain
#####################################################################################################################################################

#money
buy_grain_market_panel_money_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		stockpiling_grain_var_state > player.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
		player.stockpiling_money_state > buy_grain_market_panel

		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_grain_market_panel_money_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_grain_var_state > player.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_money_state > buy_grain_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_wood_market_panel_bath_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_wood_var_state > player.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_bath_state > buy_wood_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:wood_release_status = 0
	}

		player.var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
}

}
sell_sulfur_market_panel_real_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_sulfur_var_state > player.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_real_state > buy_sulfur_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:sulfur_release_status = 0
	}
}

		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_lead_var_state > player.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_rupee_state > buy_lead_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
}

		stockpiling_oil_var_state > player.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
		player.stockpiling_lira_state > buy_oil_market_panel

		var:oil_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_oil_market_panel_lira_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_oil_var_state > player.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_lira_state > buy_oil_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:oil_release_status = 0
	}
}

		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_dye_market_panel_swiss_franc_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_dye_var_state > player.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_swiss_franc_state > buy_dye_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:dye_release_status = 0
	}

#brazilian_real
buy_silk_market_panel_brazilian_real_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		stockpiling_silk_var_state > player.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
		player.stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > buy_silk_market_panel

		var:silk_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_silk_market_panel_brazilian_real_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_silk_var_state > player.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_brazilian_real_state > buy_silk_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		stockpiling_krone_state > buy_rubber_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
}

sell_ammunition_market_panel_bath_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_ammunition_var_state > player.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_bath_state > buy_ammunition_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:ammunition_release_status = 0
	}
}

#money
buy_artillery_market_panel_money_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		stockpiling_artillery_var_state > player.var:artillery_market_panel_quantity
		player.stockpiling_money_state > buy_artillery_market_panel

		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_artillery_market_panel_money_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_artillery_var_state > player.var:artillery_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_money_state > buy_artillery_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
}

#mark
buy_tanks_market_panel_mark_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		stockpiling_tanks_var_state > player.var:tanks_market_panel_quantity
		player.stockpiling_mark_state > buy_tanks_market_panel

		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
}
sell_tanks_market_panel_mark_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_tanks_var_state > player.var:tanks_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_mark_state > buy_tanks_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

sell_aeroplanes_market_panel_real_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_aeroplanes_var_state > player.var:aeroplanes_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_real_state > buy_aeroplanes_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}

		player.stockpiling_manowars_var_state > player.var:manowars_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_gulden_state > buy_manowars_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
}

sell_ironclads_market_panel_rupee_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		not  = {
			infamy >= infamy_threshold:pariah
		}
		player.stockpiling_ironclads_var_state > player.var:ironclads_market_panel_quantity
		stockpiling_rupee_state > buy_ironclads_market_panel
		var:sell_limit_var_1 < sell_limit_var_0

		player.var:ironclads_release_status = 0
	}
}

# ███████╗███████╗███████╗███████╗ ██████╗████████╗    ███╗   ███╗███████╗ █████╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ████╗ ████║██╔════╝██╔══██╗
# █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██║        ██║       ██╔████╔██║███████╗███████║
# ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██║        ██║       ██║╚██╔╝██║╚════██║██╔══██║
# ███████╗██║     ██║     ███████╗╚██████╗   ██║       ██║ ╚═╝ ██║███████║██║  ██║
# ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#grain
buy_grain_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#peso
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rouble
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#swiss_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price

			#brazilian_real

					}

					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}


				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.grain_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.grain_price
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.grain_price
						}
					}
				}

				if = {

						}

						subtract = {

							multiply = scope:target.grain_price

							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity

						}

			}
		}

sell_grain_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_grain_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.grain_price
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity

						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:grain_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#wood
buy_wood_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}

			#yen

				change_variable = {

					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}


				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						and = {
							scope:target = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
							is_capital = yes
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {

				}

							has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

						}

					}
				}

						}

						}

						}

							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_wood_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_wood_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.wood_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.wood_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:wood_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#coal
buy_coal_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.coal_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}

						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_coal_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_coal_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.coal_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.coal_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money

				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}

						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.coal_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:coal_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#iron
buy_iron_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}

					scope:target = {

					}

					}
				}
			}

				}

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_iron_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {

			}

			#gulden

					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.iron_price
					}
				}
			}

		}

			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_iron_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
					}

				#sterling

						scope:target = {

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#swiss_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {

						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price

					}

				#florin

					limit = {

							has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = {

					change_variable = {

						add = {

							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#krone

							has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.iron_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:iron_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#sulfur
buy_sulfur_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}
				change_variable = {

					}
				}
			}

			#yuan

					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee

					scope:target = {

					}

							has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#peso
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#swiss_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_swiss_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#belgian_franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity

				}

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
