						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#brazilian_real

						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#krone

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_sulfur_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {

					}

				}
			}

			#yuan

					scope:target = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}

					}
				}

			#belgian_franc

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					subtract = {

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.sulfur_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sulfur_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity

						scope:target = {

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rupee
				if = {
					limit = {

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.sulfur_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:sulfur_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#lead
buy_lead_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {

						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity

				is_player = yes

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						name = stockpiling_lead_state_1

					}

				###############################################

				#sterling

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency

					}
				}

					limit = {

							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1

							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						and = {
							scope:target = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
							is_capital = yes
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_real_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#gulden
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rupee
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#yen
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price

					}

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity

							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity

				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {

							has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price

					}

				#drachma

					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {

							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price

							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_lead_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
				}
			}

					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price

				}

					}

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}

			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity

						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.lead_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_lead_state_1
						subtract = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}

				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency

							multiply = owner.lead_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:lead_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#oil
buy_oil_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				change_variable = {

						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden

					scope:target = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				change_variable = {

				}

					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}


				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						and = {
							scope:target = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
							is_capital = yes
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {

						}

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
				}

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					}
					change_variable = {

					}
				}

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					change_variable = {

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}

				#peseta
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {

							has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

							has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

						}

						}

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {

						}

						is_capital = yes

						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_oil_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_oil_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}
			}

			#yuan

					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

				change_variable = {

					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.oil_price
					}
				}
			}

							add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.oil_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:oil_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#dye
buy_dye_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}
			}

			#dollar

				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#belgian_franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_belgian_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_belgian_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#florin
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_florin_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_florin_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#brazilian_real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_brazilian_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dinar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#krone
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}

			#leu
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

				change_variable = {

					add = {

			if = {

					scope:target = {

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes

					}
				}
			}

			#bath
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#qiran
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}


				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						and = {
							scope:target = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
							is_capital = yes
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {

						}

						}

							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

						}
					}
				}

				#yuan
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rupee
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#yen
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#peseta
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#ottoman_lira
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

					}

							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

							has_law = law_type:law_peso_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_peso_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				#rouble
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_rouble_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_rouble_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_swiss_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity

				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price

						is_capital = yes

						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_dye_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dye_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_peseta_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#ottoman_lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_ottoman_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ottoman_lira_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.dye_price
					}
				}
			}

			#lira
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_lira_currency

					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {

					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes

							multiply = owner.dye_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:dye_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#silk
buy_silk_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_real_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#gulden
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_gulden_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_gulden_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yuan
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yuan_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yuan_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#rupee
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_rupee_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rupee_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#yen
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_yen_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_yen_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#peseta

					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_peseta_currency
					}

						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			###############################################

		}

		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}

			every_scope_state = {
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
					}
				}


				###############################################

				#sterling
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#franc
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#money
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_money_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dollar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#mark
				if = {
					limit = {
						and = {
							scope:target = {
								has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
							}
							has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
							is_capital = yes
						}
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity

						}
					}
				}

				#real
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
						}

					change_variable = {

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity

				}

						}

					change_variable = {

							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity

							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity

							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price

					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_silk_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_silk_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.silk_price
					}
				}
			}

			#real
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.silk_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:silk_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#rubber
buy_rubber_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.rubber_price
					}

							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						subtract = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = scope:target.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################
			}
		}
	}
}

sell_rubber_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}


		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_rubber_state_1
					add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.rubber_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.rubber_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.rubber_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					subtract = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.rubber_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_mark_state_1

					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_brazilian_real_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#dinar
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_dinar_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_dinar_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#krone
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_krone_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_krone_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#leu
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_leu_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_leu_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#drachma
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_drachma_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_drachma_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#bath
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_bath_currency

						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_bath_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				#qiran
				if = {
					limit = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_qiran_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
					change_variable = {
						name = stockpiling_qiran_state_1
						add = {
							add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
							multiply = owner.rubber_price
						}
					}
				}

				###############################################

			}
		}

		change_variable = {
			name = sell_limit_var_1
			add = scope:player_country.var:rubber_market_panel_quantity
		}
	}
}
#ammunition
buy_ammunition_market_panel = {
	effect = {
		root = {
			save_scope_as = target
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				is_player = yes
			}
			save_scope_as = player_country
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_ammunition_state_1
					subtract = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
				}
			}

			###############################################

			#sterling
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_sterling_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_sterling_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.ammunition_price
					}
				}
			}

			#franc
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_franc_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_franc_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.ammunition_price
					}
				}
			}

			#money
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_money_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_money_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.ammunition_price
					}
				}
			}

			#dollar
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_dollar_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
					is_capital = yes
				}
				change_variable = {
					name = stockpiling_dollar_state_1
					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity
						multiply = owner.ammunition_price
					}
				}
			}

			#mark
			if = {
				limit = {
					and = {
						scope:target = {
							has_law = law_type:law_mark_currency
						}
						has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place
						is_capital = yes
					}
				}

			}

					scope:target = {
						has_law = law_type:law_real_currency
					}
					has_modifier = bank_central_historic_place

					add = {
						add = scope:player_country.var:ammunition_market_panel_quantity

					}
				}
			}

				}
