#####################################################################################################################################################

#  ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗    ███████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗██╗  ██╗
# ██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝╚██╗██╔╝
# ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██║   ██║█████╗  █████╗      █████╗  ██║   ██║██████╔╝█████╗   ╚███╔╝
# ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██║   ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══╝      ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══╝   ██╔██╗
# ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ╚██████╔╝██║     ██║         ██║     ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗██╔╝ ██╗
#  ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═══╝╚═╝     ╚═════╝ ╚═╝     ╚═╝         ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#sterling

sterling_buy_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_sterling_var
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
sterling_sell_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_sterling_var
			value = 0
		}
	}
}
sterling_buy_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_sterling_var = 1
	}
}
sterling_sell_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_sterling_var = 0
	}
}

			name = trade_leu_var

		}
	}

# ███████╗███████╗███████╗███████╗ ██████╗████████╗    ███████╗ ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗██╗  ██╗
# ██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝██╔════╝╚══██╔══╝    ██╔════╝██╔═══██╗██╔══██╗██╔════╝╚██╗██╔╝
# █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  █████╗  ██║        ██║       █████╗  ██║   ██║██████╔╝█████╗   ╚███╔╝
# ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██╔══╝  ██║        ██║       ██╔══╝  ██║   ██║██╔══██╗██╔══╝   ██╔██╗
# ███████╗██║     ██║     ███████╗╚██████╗   ██║       ██║     ╚██████╔╝██║  ██║███████╗██╔╝ ██╗
# ╚══════╝╚═╝     ╚═╝     ╚══════╝ ╚═════╝   ╚═╝       ╚═╝      ╚═════╝ ╚═╝  ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝

#money

money_buy_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_money_var
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
money_sell_on = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = trade_money_var
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

		var:trade_money_var = 1
	}
}
money_sell_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_money_var = 0
	}
}

			value = 3
		}
	}

			value = 3
		}
	}
}
drachma_sell_in_gold_v = {
	is_shown = {
		var:trade_drachma_var = 3
	}
}

#  ██████╗ ███╗   ██╗    ██╗ ██████╗ ███████╗███████╗    ██████╗ ███████╗██╗     ███████╗ █████╗ ███████╗███████╗
# ██╔═══██╗████╗  ██║   ██╔╝██╔═══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝    ██╔══██╗██╔════╝██║     ██╔════╝██╔══██╗██╔════╝██╔════╝
# ██║   ██║██╔██╗ ██║  ██╔╝ ██║   ██║█████╗  █████╗      ██████╔╝█████╗  ██║     █████╗  ███████║███████╗█████╗
# ██║   ██║██║╚██╗██║ ██╔╝  ██║   ██║██╔══╝  ██╔══╝      ██╔══██╗██╔══╝  ██║     ██╔══╝  ██╔══██║╚════██║██╔══╝
# ╚██████╔╝██║ ╚████║██╔╝   ╚██████╔╝██║     ██║         ██║  ██║███████╗███████╗███████╗██║  ██║███████║███████╗

	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ammunition_var
			value = 1
		}
	}
}
release_ammunition_off = {
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ammunition_var
			value = 0
		}

	}

# ╚════██║   ██║   ██║   ██║██║     ██╔═██╗ ██╔═══╝ ██║██║     ██║██║╚██╗██║██║   ██║
# ███████║   ██║   ╚██████╔╝╚██████╗██║  ██╗██║     ██║███████╗██║██║ ╚████║╚██████╔╝
# ╚══════╝   ╚═╝    ╚═════╝  ╚═════╝╚═╝  ╚═╝╚═╝     ╚═╝╚══════╝╚═╝╚═╝  ╚═══╝ ╚═════╝

#grain

#quatituy
increase_grain_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_store_quantity
		#var:grain_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_store_quantity
				#var:grain_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:grain_store_status = 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_grain_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_store_quantity
		var:grain_store_quantity > 1000
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_store_quantity
				var:grain_store_quantity > 1000
				var:grain_store_status = 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_grain_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_release_quantity
		grain_release_predicted < stockpiling_grain_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_release_quantity
				grain_release_predicted < stockpiling_grain_var_state
				var:grain_store_status = 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_grain_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_release_quantity
		var:grain_release_quantity > 1000
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_release_quantity
				var:grain_release_quantity > 1000
				var:grain_store_status = 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_grain_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_store_month
		var:grain_store_month < 1000000
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_grain_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_store_month
		var:grain_store_month > 12
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_store_month
				var:grain_store_month > 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_grain_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_release_month
		grain_release_predicted < stockpiling_grain_var_state
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_grain_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = grain_release_month
		var:grain_release_month > 12
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = grain_release_month
				var:grain_release_month > 0
				var:grain_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = grain_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_grain = {
	is_shown = {
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_grain_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:grain_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_grain_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:grain_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_grain_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:grain_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_grain_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_grain_1
				remove_modifier = store_grain_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_grain_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_grain_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_grain_var_1 < 10000000
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
		var:grain_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_grain = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_grain_var_1
			value = grain_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_month_fixe
			value = var:grain_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_grain_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_grain_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_grain_1
				remove_modifier = store_grain_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_grain_1
					multiplier = grain_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_grain_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_grain_var_1
			value = grain_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_grain_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_grain_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_grain_1
				remove_modifier = store_grain_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_grain_1
					multiplier = grain_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_grain_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#grain_release_predicted < stockpiling_grain_var_state

		grain_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_grain_var_state
		var:grain_store_status = 0
		var:grain_release_status = 0
		var:grain_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_grain = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_grain_var_1
			value = grain_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_month_fixe
			value = var:grain_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_release_quantity_1_year
			value = grain_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_grain_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_grain_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_grain_1
				remove_modifier = release_grain_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_grain_1
					multiplier = grain_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = grain_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_grain_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#wood

#quatituy
increase_wood_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_store_quantity
		#var:wood_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_store_quantity
				#var:wood_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:wood_store_status = 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_wood_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_store_quantity
		var:wood_store_quantity > 1000
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_store_quantity
				var:wood_store_quantity > 1000
				var:wood_store_status = 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_wood_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_release_quantity
		wood_release_predicted < stockpiling_wood_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_release_quantity
				wood_release_predicted < stockpiling_wood_var_state
				var:wood_store_status = 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_wood_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_release_quantity
		var:wood_release_quantity > 1000
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_release_quantity
				var:wood_release_quantity > 1000
				var:wood_store_status = 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_wood_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_store_month
		var:wood_store_month < 1000000
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_wood_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_store_month
		var:wood_store_month > 12
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_store_month
				var:wood_store_month > 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_wood_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_release_month
		wood_release_predicted < stockpiling_wood_var_state
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_wood_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = wood_release_month
		var:wood_release_month > 12
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = wood_release_month
				var:wood_release_month > 0
				var:wood_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = wood_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_wood = {
	is_shown = {
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_wood_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:wood_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_wood_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:wood_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_wood_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:wood_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_wood_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_wood_1
				remove_modifier = store_wood_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_wood_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_wood_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_wood_var_1 < 10000000
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
		var:wood_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_wood = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_wood_var_1
			value = wood_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_month_fixe
			value = var:wood_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_wood_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_wood_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_wood_1
				remove_modifier = store_wood_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_wood_1
					multiplier = wood_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_wood_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_wood_var_1
			value = wood_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_wood_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_wood_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_wood_1
				remove_modifier = store_wood_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_wood_1
					multiplier = wood_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_wood_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#wood_release_predicted < stockpiling_wood_var_state

		wood_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_wood_var_state
		var:wood_store_status = 0
		var:wood_release_status = 0
		var:wood_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_wood = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_wood_var_1
			value = wood_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_month_fixe
			value = var:wood_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_release_quantity_1_year
			value = wood_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_wood_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_wood_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_wood_1
				remove_modifier = release_wood_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_wood_1
					multiplier = wood_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = wood_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_wood_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

increase_coal_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = coal_store_quantity
		#var:coal_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:coal_store_status = 0
		var:coal_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = coal_store_quantity
				#var:coal_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:coal_store_status = 0
				var:coal_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = coal_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_coal_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = coal_store_quantity
		var:coal_store_quantity > 1000
		var:coal_store_status = 0
		var:coal_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = coal_store_quantity
				var:coal_store_quantity > 1000
				var:coal_store_status = 0
				var:coal_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = coal_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = coal_release_quantity
		coal_release_predicted < stockpiling_coal_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:coal_store_status = 0
		var:coal_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = coal_release_quantity
				coal_release_predicted < stockpiling_coal_var_state
				var:coal_store_status = 0
				var:coal_release_status = 0
			}

				name = coal_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}

			value = 1000

		}

			value = 0

	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_coal_var_1
			value = coal_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}

			name = coal_release_status

				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_coal_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_coal_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_coal_1
				remove_modifier = store_coal_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_coal_1
					multiplier = coal_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_coal_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#coal_release_predicted < stockpiling_coal_var_state

		coal_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_coal_var_state
		var:coal_store_status = 0
		var:coal_release_status = 0
		var:coal_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_coal = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_coal_var_1
			value = coal_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_release_month_fixe
			value = var:coal_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_release_quantity_1_year
			value = coal_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_coal_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_coal_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_coal_1
				remove_modifier = release_coal_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_coal_1
					multiplier = coal_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = coal_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_coal_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#iron

#quatituy
increase_iron_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_store_quantity
		#var:iron_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_store_quantity
				#var:iron_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:iron_store_status = 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_iron_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_store_quantity
		var:iron_store_quantity > 1000
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_store_quantity
				var:iron_store_quantity > 1000
				var:iron_store_status = 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_iron_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_release_quantity
		iron_release_predicted < stockpiling_iron_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_release_quantity
				iron_release_predicted < stockpiling_iron_var_state
				var:iron_store_status = 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_iron_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_release_quantity
		var:iron_release_quantity > 1000
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_release_quantity
				var:iron_release_quantity > 1000
				var:iron_store_status = 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_iron_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_store_month
		var:iron_store_month < 1000000
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_iron_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_store_month
		var:iron_store_month > 12
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_store_month
				var:iron_store_month > 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_iron_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_release_month
		iron_release_predicted < stockpiling_iron_var_state
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_iron_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = iron_release_month
		var:iron_release_month > 12
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = iron_release_month
				var:iron_release_month > 0
				var:iron_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = iron_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_iron = {
	is_shown = {
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_iron_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:iron_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_iron_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:iron_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_iron_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:iron_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_iron_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_iron_1
				remove_modifier = store_iron_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_iron_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_iron_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_iron_var_1 < 10000000
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
		var:iron_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_iron = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_iron_var_1
			value = iron_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_month_fixe
			value = var:iron_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_iron_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_iron_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_iron_1
				remove_modifier = store_iron_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_iron_1
					multiplier = iron_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_iron_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_iron_var_1
			value = iron_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_iron_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_iron_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_iron_1
				remove_modifier = store_iron_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_iron_1
					multiplier = iron_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_iron_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#iron_release_predicted < stockpiling_iron_var_state

		iron_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_iron_var_state
		var:iron_store_status = 0
		var:iron_release_status = 0
		var:iron_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_iron = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_iron_var_1
			value = iron_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_month_fixe
			value = var:iron_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_release_quantity_1_year
			value = iron_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_iron_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_iron_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_iron_1
				remove_modifier = release_iron_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_iron_1
					multiplier = iron_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = iron_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_iron_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

increase_sulfur_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = sulfur_store_quantity
		#var:sulfur_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:sulfur_store_status = 0
		var:sulfur_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = sulfur_store_quantity
				#var:sulfur_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:sulfur_store_status = 0
				var:sulfur_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = sulfur_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_sulfur_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = sulfur_store_quantity
		var:sulfur_store_quantity > 1000
		var:sulfur_store_status = 0
		var:sulfur_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = sulfur_store_quantity
				var:sulfur_store_quantity > 1000
				var:sulfur_store_status = 0
				var:sulfur_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = sulfur_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = sulfur_release_quantity
		sulfur_release_predicted < stockpiling_sulfur_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:sulfur_store_status = 0
		var:sulfur_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = sulfur_release_quantity
				sulfur_release_predicted < stockpiling_sulfur_var_state
				var:sulfur_store_status = 0
				var:sulfur_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = sulfur_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}

				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

				building_type = building_national_stockpile

			}
		}

			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_sulfur_1
				remove_modifier = store_sulfur_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_sulfur_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}

set_release_sulfur_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#sulfur_release_predicted < stockpiling_sulfur_var_state

		sulfur_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_sulfur_var_state
		var:sulfur_store_status = 0
		var:sulfur_release_status = 0
		var:sulfur_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_sulfur = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_sulfur_var_1
			value = sulfur_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_month_fixe
			value = var:sulfur_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_release_quantity_1_year
			value = sulfur_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_sulfur_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_sulfur_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_sulfur_1
				remove_modifier = release_sulfur_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_sulfur_1
					multiplier = sulfur_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = sulfur_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_sulfur_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#lead

#quatituy
increase_lead_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_store_quantity
		#var:lead_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_store_quantity
				#var:lead_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:lead_store_status = 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_lead_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_store_quantity
		var:lead_store_quantity > 1000
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_store_quantity
				var:lead_store_quantity > 1000
				var:lead_store_status = 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_lead_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_release_quantity
		lead_release_predicted < stockpiling_lead_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_release_quantity
				lead_release_predicted < stockpiling_lead_var_state
				var:lead_store_status = 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_lead_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_release_quantity
		var:lead_release_quantity > 1000
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_release_quantity
				var:lead_release_quantity > 1000
				var:lead_store_status = 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_lead_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_store_month
		var:lead_store_month < 1000000
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_lead_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_store_month
		var:lead_store_month > 12
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_store_month
				var:lead_store_month > 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_lead_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_release_month
		lead_release_predicted < stockpiling_lead_var_state
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_lead_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = lead_release_month
		var:lead_release_month > 12
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = lead_release_month
				var:lead_release_month > 0
				var:lead_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = lead_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_lead = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_lead_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lead_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_lead_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:lead_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_lead_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:lead_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_lead_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_lead_1
				remove_modifier = store_lead_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_lead_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_lead_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_lead_var_1 < 10000000
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
		var:lead_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_lead = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_lead_var_1
			value = lead_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_month_fixe
			value = var:lead_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_lead_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_lead_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_lead_1
				remove_modifier = store_lead_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_lead_1
					multiplier = lead_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_lead_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_lead_var_1
			value = lead_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_lead_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_lead_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_lead_1
				remove_modifier = store_lead_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_lead_1
					multiplier = lead_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_lead_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#lead_release_predicted < stockpiling_lead_var_state

		lead_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_lead_var_state
		var:lead_store_status = 0
		var:lead_release_status = 0
		var:lead_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_lead = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_lead_var_1
			value = lead_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_month_fixe
			value = var:lead_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_release_quantity_1_year
			value = lead_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_lead_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_lead_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_lead_1
				remove_modifier = release_lead_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_lead_1
					multiplier = lead_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = lead_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_lead_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

				has_variable = oil_store_quantity

				var:oil_store_status = 0
				var:oil_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = oil_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = oil_store_quantity
		var:oil_store_quantity > 1000
		var:oil_store_status = 0
		var:oil_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = oil_store_quantity
				var:oil_store_quantity > 1000
				var:oil_store_status = 0
				var:oil_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = oil_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}

		has_variable = oil_release_quantity
		oil_release_predicted < stockpiling_oil_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:oil_store_status = 0
		var:oil_release_status = 0

	effect = {

			limit = {
				has_variable = oil_release_quantity
				oil_release_predicted < stockpiling_oil_var_state
				var:oil_store_status = 0
				var:oil_release_status = 0

				add = 500
			}

set_release_oil = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_oil_var_1
			value = oil_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_release_month_fixe
			value = var:oil_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_release_quantity_1_year
			value = oil_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_oil_0
			}

				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_oil_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_oil_1
				remove_modifier = release_oil_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_oil_1
					multiplier = oil_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = oil_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_oil_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#dye

#quatituy
increase_dye_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_store_quantity
		#var:dye_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_store_quantity
				#var:dye_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:dye_store_status = 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_dye_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_store_quantity
		var:dye_store_quantity > 1000
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_store_quantity
				var:dye_store_quantity > 1000
				var:dye_store_status = 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_dye_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_release_quantity
		dye_release_predicted < stockpiling_dye_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_release_quantity
				dye_release_predicted < stockpiling_dye_var_state
				var:dye_store_status = 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_dye_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_release_quantity
		var:dye_release_quantity > 1000
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_release_quantity
				var:dye_release_quantity > 1000
				var:dye_store_status = 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_dye_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_store_month
		var:dye_store_month < 1000000
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_dye_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_store_month
		var:dye_store_month > 12
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_store_month
				var:dye_store_month > 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_dye_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_release_month
		dye_release_predicted < stockpiling_dye_var_state
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_dye_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = dye_release_month
		var:dye_release_month > 12
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = dye_release_month
				var:dye_release_month > 0
				var:dye_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = dye_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_dye = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_dye_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dye_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_dye_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:dye_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_dye_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:dye_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_dye_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_dye_1
				remove_modifier = store_dye_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_dye_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_dye_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_dye_var_1 < 10000000
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
		var:dye_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_dye = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_dye_var_1
			value = dye_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_month_fixe
			value = var:dye_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_dye_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_dye_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_dye_1
				remove_modifier = store_dye_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_dye_1
					multiplier = dye_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_dye_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_dye_var_1
			value = dye_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_dye_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_dye_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_dye_1
				remove_modifier = store_dye_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_dye_1
					multiplier = dye_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_dye_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#dye_release_predicted < stockpiling_dye_var_state

		dye_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_dye_var_state
		var:dye_store_status = 0
		var:dye_release_status = 0
		var:dye_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_dye = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_dye_var_1
			value = dye_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_month_fixe
			value = var:dye_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_release_quantity_1_year
			value = dye_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_dye_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_dye_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_dye_1
				remove_modifier = release_dye_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_dye_1
					multiplier = dye_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = dye_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_dye_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

		#var:silk_store_quantity < 1000000

		var:silk_release_status = 0
	}

			limit = {
				has_variable = silk_store_quantity
				#var:silk_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:silk_store_status = 0
				var:silk_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = silk_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = silk_store_quantity
		var:silk_store_quantity > 1000
		var:silk_store_status = 0
		var:silk_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = silk_store_quantity
				var:silk_store_quantity > 1000
				var:silk_store_status = 0
				var:silk_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = silk_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}

		silk_release_predicted < stockpiling_silk_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod

	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_silk_var_1
			value = silk_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_release_month_fixe
			value = var:silk_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_release_quantity_1_year
			value = silk_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_silk_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_silk_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_silk_1
				remove_modifier = release_silk_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_silk_1
					multiplier = silk_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = silk_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_silk_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#rubber

#quatituy
increase_rubber_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_store_quantity
		#var:rubber_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_store_quantity
				#var:rubber_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:rubber_store_status = 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_rubber_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_store_quantity
		var:rubber_store_quantity > 1000
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_store_quantity
				var:rubber_store_quantity > 1000
				var:rubber_store_status = 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_rubber_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_release_quantity
		rubber_release_predicted < stockpiling_rubber_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_release_quantity
				rubber_release_predicted < stockpiling_rubber_var_state
				var:rubber_store_status = 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_rubber_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_release_quantity
		var:rubber_release_quantity > 1000
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_release_quantity
				var:rubber_release_quantity > 1000
				var:rubber_store_status = 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_rubber_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_store_month
		var:rubber_store_month < 1000000
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_rubber_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_store_month
		var:rubber_store_month > 12
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_store_month
				var:rubber_store_month > 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_rubber_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_release_month
		rubber_release_predicted < stockpiling_rubber_var_state
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_rubber_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = rubber_release_month
		var:rubber_release_month > 12
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = rubber_release_month
				var:rubber_release_month > 0
				var:rubber_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = rubber_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_rubber = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_rubber_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rubber_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_rubber_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:rubber_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_rubber_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_rubber_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_rubber_1
				remove_modifier = store_rubber_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_rubber_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_rubber_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_rubber_var_1 < 10000000
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
		var:rubber_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_rubber = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_rubber_var_1
			value = rubber_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_month_fixe
			value = var:rubber_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_rubber_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_rubber_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_rubber_1
				remove_modifier = store_rubber_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_rubber_1
					multiplier = rubber_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_rubber_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_rubber_var_1
			value = rubber_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_rubber_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_rubber_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_rubber_1
				remove_modifier = store_rubber_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_rubber_1
					multiplier = rubber_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_rubber_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#rubber_release_predicted < stockpiling_rubber_var_state

		rubber_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_rubber_var_state
		var:rubber_store_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_status = 0
		var:rubber_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_rubber = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_rubber_var_1
			value = rubber_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_month_fixe
			value = var:rubber_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_release_quantity_1_year
			value = rubber_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_rubber_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_rubber_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_rubber_1
				remove_modifier = release_rubber_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_rubber_1
					multiplier = rubber_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = rubber_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_rubber_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#quatituy
increase_ammunition_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ammunition_store_quantity
		#var:ammunition_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:ammunition_store_status = 0
		var:ammunition_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ammunition_store_quantity
				#var:ammunition_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:ammunition_store_status = 0
				var:ammunition_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ammunition_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_ammunition_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ammunition_store_quantity
		var:ammunition_store_quantity > 1000
		var:ammunition_store_status = 0
		var:ammunition_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ammunition_store_quantity
				var:ammunition_store_quantity > 1000
				var:ammunition_store_status = 0
				var:ammunition_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ammunition_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ammunition_release_quantity
		ammunition_release_predicted < stockpiling_ammunition_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:ammunition_store_status = 0
		var:ammunition_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ammunition_release_quantity
				ammunition_release_predicted < stockpiling_ammunition_var_state
				var:ammunition_store_status = 0
				var:ammunition_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ammunition_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}

		var:ammunition_release_status = 0

	is_valid = {
		var:ammunition_release_status = 0
	}

			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

				building_type = building_national_stockpile

			}
		}

			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_ammunition_1
				remove_modifier = store_ammunition_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ammunition_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
