set_release_ammunition = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ammunition_var_1
			value = ammunition_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_month_fixe
			value = var:ammunition_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_release_quantity_1_year
			value = ammunition_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_ammunition_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_ammunition_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_ammunition_1
				remove_modifier = release_ammunition_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_ammunition_1
					multiplier = ammunition_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ammunition_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ammunition_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#small_arms

#quatituy
increase_small_arms_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_store_quantity
		#var:small_arms_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_store_quantity
				#var:small_arms_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:small_arms_store_status = 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_small_arms_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_store_quantity
		var:small_arms_store_quantity > 1000
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_store_quantity
				var:small_arms_store_quantity > 1000
				var:small_arms_store_status = 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_small_arms_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_release_quantity
		small_arms_release_predicted < stockpiling_small_arms_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_release_quantity
				small_arms_release_predicted < stockpiling_small_arms_var_state
				var:small_arms_store_status = 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_small_arms_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_release_quantity
		var:small_arms_release_quantity > 1000
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_release_quantity
				var:small_arms_release_quantity > 1000
				var:small_arms_store_status = 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_small_arms_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_store_month
		var:small_arms_store_month < 1000000
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_small_arms_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_store_month
		var:small_arms_store_month > 12
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_store_month
				var:small_arms_store_month > 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_small_arms_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_release_month
		small_arms_release_predicted < stockpiling_small_arms_var_state
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_small_arms_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = small_arms_release_month
		var:small_arms_release_month > 12
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = small_arms_release_month
				var:small_arms_release_month > 0
				var:small_arms_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = small_arms_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_small_arms = {
	is_shown = {
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_small_arms_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:small_arms_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_small_arms_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:small_arms_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_small_arms_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_small_arms_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_small_arms_1
				remove_modifier = store_small_arms_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_small_arms_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_small_arms_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_small_arms_var_1 < 10000000
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
		var:small_arms_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_small_arms = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_small_arms_var_1
			value = small_arms_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_month_fixe
			value = var:small_arms_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_small_arms_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_small_arms_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_small_arms_1
				remove_modifier = store_small_arms_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_small_arms_1
					multiplier = small_arms_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_small_arms_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_small_arms_var_1
			value = small_arms_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_small_arms_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_small_arms_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_small_arms_1
				remove_modifier = store_small_arms_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_small_arms_1
					multiplier = small_arms_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_small_arms_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#small_arms_release_predicted < stockpiling_small_arms_var_state

		small_arms_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_small_arms_var_state
		var:small_arms_store_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_status = 0
		var:small_arms_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_small_arms = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_small_arms_var_1
			value = small_arms_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_month_fixe
			value = var:small_arms_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_release_quantity_1_year
			value = small_arms_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_small_arms_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_small_arms_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_small_arms_1
				remove_modifier = release_small_arms_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_small_arms_1
					multiplier = small_arms_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = small_arms_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_small_arms_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#artillery

#quatituy
increase_artillery_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_store_quantity
		#var:artillery_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_store_quantity
				#var:artillery_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:artillery_store_status = 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_artillery_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_store_quantity
		var:artillery_store_quantity > 1000
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_store_quantity
				var:artillery_store_quantity > 1000
				var:artillery_store_status = 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_artillery_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_release_quantity
		artillery_release_predicted < stockpiling_artillery_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_release_quantity
				artillery_release_predicted < stockpiling_artillery_var_state
				var:artillery_store_status = 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_artillery_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_release_quantity
		var:artillery_release_quantity > 1000
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_release_quantity
				var:artillery_release_quantity > 1000
				var:artillery_store_status = 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_artillery_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_store_month
		var:artillery_store_month < 1000000
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_artillery_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_store_month
		var:artillery_store_month > 12
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_store_month
				var:artillery_store_month > 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_artillery_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_release_month
		artillery_release_predicted < stockpiling_artillery_var_state
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_artillery_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = artillery_release_month
		var:artillery_release_month > 12
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = artillery_release_month
				var:artillery_release_month > 0
				var:artillery_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = artillery_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

default_artillery = {
	is_shown = {
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_artillery_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:artillery_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_artillery_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:artillery_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_artillery_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_artillery_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_artillery_1
				remove_modifier = store_artillery_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_artillery_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_artillery_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_artillery_var_1 < 10000000
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
		var:artillery_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_artillery = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_artillery_var_1
			value = artillery_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_month_fixe
			value = var:artillery_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_artillery_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_artillery_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_artillery_1
				remove_modifier = store_artillery_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_artillery_1
					multiplier = artillery_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_artillery_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_artillery_var_1
			value = artillery_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile

			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_artillery_1
			}
		}

			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_artillery_1
				remove_modifier = store_artillery_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_artillery_1
					multiplier = artillery_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_artillery_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#artillery_release_predicted < stockpiling_artillery_var_state

		artillery_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_artillery_var_state
		var:artillery_store_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_status = 0
		var:artillery_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_artillery = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_artillery_var_1
			value = artillery_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_month_fixe
			value = var:artillery_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_release_quantity_1_year
			value = artillery_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_artillery_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_artillery_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_artillery_1
				remove_modifier = release_artillery_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_artillery_1
					multiplier = artillery_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = artillery_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_artillery_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#tanks

#quatituy
increase_tanks_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_store_quantity
		#var:tanks_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_store_quantity
				#var:tanks_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:tanks_store_status = 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_tanks_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_store_quantity
		var:tanks_store_quantity > 1000
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_store_quantity
				var:tanks_store_quantity > 1000
				var:tanks_store_status = 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_tanks_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_release_quantity
		tanks_release_predicted < stockpiling_tanks_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_release_quantity
				tanks_release_predicted < stockpiling_tanks_var_state
				var:tanks_store_status = 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_tanks_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_release_quantity
		var:tanks_release_quantity > 1000
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_release_quantity
				var:tanks_release_quantity > 1000
				var:tanks_store_status = 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_tanks_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_store_month
		var:tanks_store_month < 1000000
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_tanks_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_store_month
		var:tanks_store_month > 12
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_store_month
				var:tanks_store_month > 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_tanks_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_release_month
		tanks_release_predicted < stockpiling_tanks_var_state
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_tanks_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = tanks_release_month
		var:tanks_release_month > 12
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = tanks_release_month
				var:tanks_release_month > 0
				var:tanks_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = tanks_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_tanks = {
	is_shown = {
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_tanks_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:tanks_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_tanks_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:tanks_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_tanks_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_tanks_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_tanks_1
				remove_modifier = store_tanks_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_tanks_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_tanks_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_tanks_var_1 < 10000000
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
		var:tanks_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_tanks = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_tanks_var_1
			value = tanks_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_month_fixe
			value = var:tanks_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_tanks_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_tanks_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_tanks_1
				remove_modifier = store_tanks_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_tanks_1
					multiplier = tanks_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_tanks_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_tanks_var_1
			value = tanks_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_tanks_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_tanks_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_tanks_1
				remove_modifier = store_tanks_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_tanks_1
					multiplier = tanks_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_tanks_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#tanks_release_predicted < stockpiling_tanks_var_state

		tanks_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_tanks_var_state
		var:tanks_store_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_status = 0
		var:tanks_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_tanks = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_tanks_var_1
			value = tanks_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_month_fixe
			value = var:tanks_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_release_quantity_1_year
			value = tanks_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_tanks_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_tanks_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_tanks_1
				remove_modifier = release_tanks_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_tanks_1
					multiplier = tanks_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = tanks_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_tanks_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#aeroplanes

#quatituy
increase_aeroplanes_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = aeroplanes_store_quantity
		#var:aeroplanes_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = aeroplanes_store_quantity
				#var:aeroplanes_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
				var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = aeroplanes_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_aeroplanes_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = aeroplanes_store_quantity
		var:aeroplanes_store_quantity > 1000
		var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = aeroplanes_store_quantity
				var:aeroplanes_store_quantity > 1000
				var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
				var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = aeroplanes_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_aeroplanes_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = aeroplanes_release_quantity
		aeroplanes_release_predicted < stockpiling_aeroplanes_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = aeroplanes_release_quantity
				aeroplanes_release_predicted < stockpiling_aeroplanes_var_state
				var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
				var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = aeroplanes_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_aeroplanes_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = aeroplanes_release_quantity
		var:aeroplanes_release_quantity > 1000
		var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = aeroplanes_release_quantity
				var:aeroplanes_release_quantity > 1000
				var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
				var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = aeroplanes_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}

	}
}

		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 1
	}

	is_valid = {
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
	}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_aeroplanes_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_aeroplanes_1
				remove_modifier = store_aeroplanes_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_aeroplanes_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_month
			value = 12
		}

					multiplier = aeroplanes_store_for_modifier
				}

	}

					multiplier = aeroplanes_store_for_modifier
				}

set_release_aeroplanes_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#aeroplanes_release_predicted < stockpiling_aeroplanes_var_state

		aeroplanes_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_aeroplanes_var_state
		var:aeroplanes_store_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_status = 0
		var:aeroplanes_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_aeroplanes = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_aeroplanes_var_1
			value = aeroplanes_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_month_fixe
			value = var:aeroplanes_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_release_quantity_1_year
			value = aeroplanes_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_aeroplanes_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_aeroplanes_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_aeroplanes_1
				remove_modifier = release_aeroplanes_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_aeroplanes_1
					multiplier = aeroplanes_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = aeroplanes_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_aeroplanes_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#manowars

#quatituy
increase_manowars_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_store_quantity
		#var:manowars_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_store_quantity
				#var:manowars_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:manowars_store_status = 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_manowars_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_store_quantity
		var:manowars_store_quantity > 1000
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_store_quantity
				var:manowars_store_quantity > 1000
				var:manowars_store_status = 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_manowars_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_release_quantity
		manowars_release_predicted < stockpiling_manowars_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_release_quantity
				manowars_release_predicted < stockpiling_manowars_var_state
				var:manowars_store_status = 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_manowars_quantity_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_release_quantity
		var:manowars_release_quantity > 1000
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_release_quantity
				var:manowars_release_quantity > 1000
				var:manowars_store_status = 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_release_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

#time
increase_manowars_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_store_month
		var:manowars_store_month < 1000000
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_store_month
				add = 12
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_manowars_month_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_store_month
		var:manowars_store_month > 12
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_store_month
				var:manowars_store_month > 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_store_month
				subtract = 12
			}
		}
	}
}

increase_manowars_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_release_month
		manowars_release_predicted < stockpiling_manowars_var_state
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_release_month
				add = 6
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_manowars_month_release = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = manowars_release_month
		var:manowars_release_month > 12
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = manowars_release_month
				var:manowars_release_month > 0
				var:manowars_release_status = 0

			}
			change_variable = {
				name = manowars_release_month
				subtract = 6
			}
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

default_manowars = {
	is_shown = {
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
}
store_manowars_green_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:manowars_store_status = 1
	}
}

release_manowars_red_bar = {
	is_shown = {
		var:manowars_release_status = 1
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################

set_manowars_0 = {
	is_valid = {
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_manowars_0
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_manowars_1
				remove_modifier = store_manowars_1
			}
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = release_manowars_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_month
			value = 12
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_month
			value = 12
		}
	}
}

set_store_manowars_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		stockpiling_manowars_var_1 < 10000000
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
		var:manowars_store_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_store_manowars = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_manowars_var_1
			value = manowars_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_month_fixe
			value = var:manowars_store_month
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_manowars_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_manowars_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_manowars_1
				remove_modifier = store_manowars_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_manowars_1
					multiplier = manowars_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
set_store_manowars_infinit = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = store_manowars_var_1
			value = manowars_store_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_month_fixe
			value = 9999
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_month
			value = 9999
		}

		#reset release
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_quantity
			value = 1000
		}
		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_manowars_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_store_manowars_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = release_manowars_1
				remove_modifier = store_manowars_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = store_manowars_1
					multiplier = manowars_store_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

set_release_manowars_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#manowars_release_predicted < stockpiling_manowars_var_state

		manowars_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_manowars_var_state
		var:manowars_store_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_status = 0
		var:manowars_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_manowars = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_manowars_var_1
			value = manowars_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_month_fixe
			value = var:manowars_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_release_quantity_1_year
			value = manowars_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_manowars_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_manowars_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_manowars_1
				remove_modifier = release_manowars_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_manowars_1
					multiplier = manowars_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = manowars_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_manowars_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################

#quatituy
increase_ironclads_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ironclads_store_quantity
		#var:ironclads_store_quantity < 1000000
		var:ironclads_store_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ironclads_store_quantity
				#var:ironclads_store_quantity < 1000000
				var:ironclads_store_status = 0
				var:ironclads_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ironclads_store_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}
}
reduce_ironclads_quantity_store = {
	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ironclads_store_quantity
		var:ironclads_store_quantity > 1000
		var:ironclads_store_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ironclads_store_quantity
				var:ironclads_store_quantity > 1000
				var:ironclads_store_status = 0
				var:ironclads_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ironclads_store_quantity
				subtract = 500
			}
		}
	}
}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ironclads_release_quantity
		ironclads_release_predicted < stockpiling_ironclads_var_state #chose la plus importante du mod
		var:ironclads_store_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_status = 0
	}
	effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_variable = ironclads_release_quantity
				ironclads_release_predicted < stockpiling_ironclads_var_state
				var:ironclads_store_status = 0
				var:ironclads_release_status = 0
			}
			change_variable = {
				name = ironclads_release_quantity
				add = 500
			}
		}
	}

	is_valid = {
		has_variable = ironclads_release_quantity
		var:ironclads_release_quantity > 1000
		var:ironclads_store_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_status = 0

			value = 0
		}

			name = release_ironclads_var_1
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {

			value = 12

set_release_ironclads_enabled = {
	is_valid = {
		#ironclads_release_predicted < stockpiling_ironclads_var_state

		ironclads_release_predicted_no_limit < stockpiling_ironclads_var_state
		var:ironclads_store_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_status = 0
		var:ironclads_release_quantity > 0
	}
}
set_release_ironclads = {
	is_shown = {
	}
	effect = {
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ironclads_var_1
			value = ironclads_release_quantity_1_week
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_store_quantity
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_release_status
			value = 1
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_release_month_fixe
			value = var:ironclads_release_month
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_release_quantity_1_year
			value = ironclads_release_predicted
		}

		every_scope_state = {
			limit = {
				has_building = building_national_stockpile
			}

			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_ironclads_0
			}
			activate_production_method = {
				building_type = building_national_stockpile
				production_method = pm_release_ironclads_1
			}
		}
		every_scope_building = {
			if  = {
				limit = {
					is_building_type = building_national_stockpile
				}
				remove_modifier = store_ironclads_1
				remove_modifier = release_ironclads_1
				add_modifier = {
					name = release_ironclads_1
					multiplier = ironclads_release_for_modifier
				}
			}
		}

		#reset store
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_store_status
			value = 0
		}
		set_variable = {
			name = ironclads_store_quantity
			value = 1000
		}

		#test
		set_variable = {
			name = release_ironclads_time
			value = 0
		}
	}
}

#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
#####################################################################################################################################################
